page.title: 14LOCAL HOSPITALS, BROMSGROVE
page.content: There are two hospitals in the area, the Royal Orthopaedic and Hill Top Hospital. Both are orthopaedic hospitals. We visited Hill Top which has two wards, one in use on weekdays only for minor operations. The ward which we visited had 20 beds -10 each for men and women - with a nurses station in the middle. A day- room was available with T.V for mobile patients. All operations are carried out in the one theatre and include replacement of hip, knee, finger and toe joints. Other departments in the hospital are: administration, catering, medical secretaries, mangement services, pathology laboratory, nurses home, X-ray, physiotherapy, engineering, laundry and mortuary. The hospital is set in a semi-rural environment with panoramic views.
